.lhub-banner-slim{padding:16px 0}.lhub-banner-slim .lhub-banner-logos{display:inline-block;background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:center;background-size:contain;width:180px;height:24px;margin:12px 0 0}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.lhub-banner-slim{white-space:nowrap}.lhub-banner-slim br,.lhub-banner-slim br:after{content:' ';width:.25rem}.lhub-banner-slim .section-text{display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-align:center;-ms-flex-align:center;align-items:center;-webkit-box-pack:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;justify-content:center}.lhub-banner-slim .section-text a{margin:0 12px 0 4px}.lhub-banner-slim .lhub-banner-logos{margin:0}}
